name: Solitaire Stories - The Quest For Seeta
name_original: Solitaire Stories - The Quest For Seeta
description:
Features:
1. A solitaire game based on the ancient Indian mythical epic story of Ramayana.
2. Journey through incredible locations.
3. Make chain combos and clear cards to reach the dungeons of Lanka.
4. Play match pair solitaire mini games to battle with monsters.
5. More than 100 levels with unique layouts offering hours of gameplay.
6. Exciting power ups to help you win.

The demon king Raavan has abducted Princess Seeta and has held her captive in the dungeons of Lanka. Embark on a journey with Prince Ram in the quest to save his wife. Play solitaire games to pass through forests, mountains, swamplands, underground passages and more. Battle with mythical monsters who block your way. The trusted and faithful Laksman and Hanuman will aid you in this dangerous mission.
